Dashboard API Sobre

Documentação da API

Esta seção descreve endpoints básicos para acessar dados climáticos do GDASH. Ajuste conforme o teu backend.

Autenticação

Bearer token via header Authorization: Bearer <TOKEN>

Endpoints principais

GET /api/v1/stations

GET /api/v1/stations
Response: 200
[
  {
    "id": "station-01",
    "name": "Praia A",
    "lat": -23.5,
    "lon": -46.6
  },
  ...
]

GET /api/v1/stations/{id}/observations?from=YYYY-MM-DD&to=YYYY-MM-DD

GET /api/v1/stations/station-01/observations?from=2025-01-01&to=2025-01-03
Response: 200
[
  { "timestamp": "2025-01-01T12:00:00Z", "temp": 28.3, "humidity": 78, "wind": 12 },
  ...
]

POST /api/v1/observations

POST /api/v1/observations
Body:
{
  "stationId": "station-01",
  "timestamp": "2025-11-29T10:12:00Z",
  "temp": 27.8,
  "humidity": 80,
  "wind": 10
}

Exemplos em cURL

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" "https://api.seudominio.com/api/v1/stations"

Dica: se quiser, eu gero também um arquivo Postman/Insomnia já com exemplos e collection.
